comment: This class isnt as bad, but her lectures can be very long so its best to write down as listening. Taking her as a criminology teacher, I learned a lot. The test can be very long and tricky so study hard for this class

Raeda is one of the best teachers I've ever taken at KSU. The examples used to explain the theories were outstanding.Four tests, one paper broken up into three parts, and weekly questions. Attendance is not mandatory, but you will want to attend every class so you won't miss anything. I'm going to hate to see her go after the summer semester.
Had her for Deviance and Social Control. She's very clear in what she expects of her students. She's also very charismatic and easy to listen to.

I took Raeda for Crim as well as Dev. She is AWESOME. Her lectures are never a bore, she's full of energy and tailors her style of lecture to the classroom's learning style. She REALLY cares about her students as well as how well they do.

I really enjoyed taking her class. Online discussions are the majority of your grade, but they are not a huge deal. There are no tests, but there is a final presentation. It is easy to get in A in this class if you attend class and put in effort. Raeda really wants to see all of her students do well! She is one of my favorite professors!

Best professor I had this semester. Interesting, engaging, and hilarious! I wish I could take her class every semester, but I only took SOC1101 for the social science credit. She is down to earth and is obviously very knowledgeable. She is an extremely lenient grader and gives out a reasonable about of homework. Take Raeda if you  can!

BEST professor I have ever had. I learned so much, and I remember everything. I would love to take her again, and highly recommend her to everybody. She's not the easiest professor, but the class is all application, so you retain everything you learn.

Textbook will be your best friend. She is passionate, knowledgeable, and full of youth and motivation. Never boring! A superb speaker, informative, and an open book. She loves to utilize the Discussion Boards, puts people in groups, and requires a group presentation at end of semester. No exams, no quizzes. Thoroughly learned. Great professor!!

I just finished taking her class, and she is a great professor! I made an A in the class but I had to work hard for it. There were 3 tests, 3 papers, and a debate in class. For the final you could do 20 hours community service and complete a packet with it, or take a 150 fill in the blank test.. I recommend taking her! GREAT PROFESSOR!!

I thought for sure I was going to get a B in the class, but managed to get an A. The online discussions weighed a lot as far as grades go, and I didn't go that well on them, but the daily questions and the extra credit definitely helped my grade. She makes class interesting and posts the PPs online, but it helped to have the book for citing.

Raeda is an Awesome professor. She has an amazing sense of humor and is very personable.There are no 'tests' in her class but you do have to write online discussions that count as your test grades. There is no final. She presents information well and is very clear. You also get to do an awesome extra credit demonstration. TAKE HER CLASSES.

SHE IS AWESOME! I am an international student and this is the first semester for me, so I was a bit afraid of taking any classes in English. However, her lectures are so much fun, interesting, and clear, and she is very nice and supportive to everyone. I love her so much and wish I could take another class of her too!

AWESOME, FUN, and ENTERTAINING! NO TESTS OR QUIZZES! Just easy daily questions, weekly discussions and a final paper.  Might as well be at a comedy show.  You learn a lot while having fun.  She's really passionate about the material and presents it in an understandable way.  Sad to leave at end of semester.
Great Teacher!! Tests are hard but if you study you should be fine! She makes class interesting and is very helpful!!

Raeda is the best professor i had this semester. She made  Sociology interesting and enjoyable! Take Her! She isn't the easiest teacher, but she is very fair in grading and in general! She also has an awesome personality!
Not hard class, just got to put in a good bit of work into it. Interesting class and fun. Great teacher.

Enthusiastic teacher, incredibly caring & helpful to students. DON'T text in class. Read the syllabus, it has important grade info. I highly recommend taking this professor if you want a teacher who doesn't assume you already know everything!! You WILL learn if you pay attention & participate in discussions.
absolutely LOVED her class. She makes the material clear but definitely go to class to get the notes. she is more than willing to help and fun to talk to in general.
Raeda is freaking awesome! She makes Sociology so fun and interesting. Totally loved this class and the information I got out of it was very useful! Take her! You won't regret it!
Great Claass
very outgoing
